/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out below, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up on either side of the street, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a vibrant contrast to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
